Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Identify cases containing sequence Approve Purchase Requisition Create Order Confirm Order in direct succession ordered by timestamp

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Use LEAD window functions partitioned by case_id ordered by timestamp to check current next and next next activities and timestamps

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Define conditions activity equals Approve Purchase Requisition and LEAD activity 1 equals Create Order and LEAD activity 2 equals Confirm Order

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Add timing condition DATEDIFF day LEAD timestamp 1 LEAD timestamp 2 greater than 5

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Select distinct case_id from matching rows to get bad cases to exclude

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Final select all from event_log where case_id not in bad cases

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Confirm LEAD ensures direct succession as next row is immediate follower by timestamp order

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Verify time diff between Create Order and Confirm Order timestamps correct

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Consider NOT IN versus NOT EXISTS but stick with NOT IN for readability

Name: Counterfactual Reasoning - IND
Text: Consider edge case identical timestamps may affect order but assume timestamp sufficient

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Debate DATEDIFF day versus interval greater than 5 days choose DATEDIFF as standard

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Optimize CTE by filtering only Approve Purchase Requisition rows first before LEAD

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Confirm NULL handling for short sequences excluded correctly by WHERE conditions
